review: I am an Apple fan and wanted to love this product but it seems  this product needs more improvement. I have a MacBook Pro late 2012 that I am using with Apple TV and sometimes for no reason Apple TV drops its wireless connection to the laptop. Although I have pretty good download speed for Utube video streaming (35 mb/s) and my computer plays it perfectly but sometimes Apple TV can not keep up and there are some annoying interruptions.I am only connecting to Apple TV & Utube @ 720p.The interesting part is when I don't use Utube and use videos from my computer to Apple TV those interruptions becomes much less frequent. Hopefully future firmware updates will improve the connectivity.Update 7-17-2014After playing around I finally found out what was causing those annoying interruptions!! It was caused by my own wireless networks!! I have Verizon Fios wireless & Apple Airport Extreme in the house, I noticed that there was a conflict between these two so I disabled Fios WiFi and its all good now, no more interruptions.Now rating should be 5 Stars.
